rulesStrings.li: watching_aurora->Auroras are so rare and stunningly beautiful...
watching_aurora(INITIATOR_artistic_passion!=None)->Auroras are so inspiring — I need to start an art piece before its image fades away from my memory...
watching_aurora(INITIATOR_artistic_passion!=None)->Auroras are so inspiring — I need to get its image on paper before it fades away from my memory...
watching_aurora->This aurora has got so many vibrant colors, but I'm in love with its [aurora_color] hues...
job_beatfire_come->Quick, [RECIPIENT_nameDef] — come here and help me [put_it_out]!
job_beatfire_ignoring_static->Don't just stand there, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]! Come here and help me [put_it_out]!
job_beatfire_ignoring->Where are you going, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]!? Come here and help me [put_it_out]!
job_beatfire_letsgo(RECIPIENT_jobDefName!=BeatFire,priority=1)->Where are you going, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]!? The fire's over there — help me [put_it_out]!
job_beatfire_letsgo->Come on [RECIPIENT_nameDef] — we got a fire to [fire_put_out]!
job_beatfire_letsgo->There's a fire over there, [RECIPIENT_nameDef] — let's go [put_it_out]!
billiards_shot_description->Mmm, let me try this [billiards_shot_type] shot...
billiards_shot_description->Mmm, what if I try this [billiards_shot_type] shot...
billiards_shot_description->Maybe if I hit ball [billiards_ball] with the right cut-angle...
billiards_shot_description(INITIATOR_shooting_level>=10)->Just watch me — I'll [billiards_pot] ball [billiards_ball] in that [billiards_pocket] pocket.
billiards_invite->I'm going to start a new billiards game. Would you like to join me, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]?
billiards_invite->Would you like to join me in a new billiards match, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]?
billiards_ready->Time to activate beast mode, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]. Are you ready?
billiards_ready->Are you in for another game, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]?
billiards_ready->Cue is chalked, rack is set up. Ready, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]?
game_chess_invite->I'm going to play chess. Would you like to join me, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]?
game_chess_invite->Would you like to join me in a chess game, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]?
chess_comment(INITIATOR_artistic_passion!=None)->I think that while all artists are not chess players, all chess players are artists.
chess_comment(INITIATOR_trait==ascetic)->In life, as in chess, one's own pawns block one's way.
chess_comment(INITIATOR_intellectual_level<5)->Every chess master was once a beginner.
chess_comment->I am convinced that the way one plays chess always reflects the player's personality.
chess_comment->Chess doesn't drive people mad, it keeps mad people sane.
chess_comment->Pawns are the soul of this game.
job_clean_static->Whoa — what a [swearword]mess. Let's clean it!
job_clean_static(INITIATOR_jobText==cleaning blood.)->Whoa — that's a lot of [swearword]blood! Let's clean it!
job_clean_static(INITIATOR_jobText==cleaning rock rubble.)->Mmm... let's remove these rocks...
job_clean_static(INITIATOR_jobText==cleaning building rubble.)->Mmm... let's clean this debris...
job_clean_going->There are so many [swearword][cleaning] chores to do around here...
job_clean_going(INITIATOR_jobText==cleaning blood.)->I saw a lot of [swearword]blood over there — I'll go and clean it.
job_clean_going(INITIATOR_jobText==cleaning rock rubble.)->I'm going to remove those rocks...
job_clean_going(INITIATOR_jobText==cleaning vomit.)->Cleaning up vomit isn't nice, but someone has to do it...
job_clean_going(INITIATOR_jobText==cleaning building rubble.)->I'm going to clean that debris...
wipe_feet->Nobody ever wipes their feet, so here I go cleaning more
cloud_watching->Look at that cloud! Doesn't it [cloud_analogy] [a_cloudshape]?
watching_eclipse(INITIATOR_trait==night owl)->The longer this eclipse lasts, the wider my smile will be.
watching_eclipse(INITIATOR_artistic_passion!=None)->An elegant dance of celestial bodies brought us this stunning sky composition...
watching_eclipse->Eclipses are so peculiar — it seems like night, but it's [DAYPERIOD].
drinking_beer->Here's to those who wish us well, all the rest can go to hell!
drinking_beer->Let's have a toast to the incompetence of our enemies!
drinking_beer->Fine beer for my real friends and real pain for my sham friends!
drinking_beer->Here's to the floor, who will hold you when no one else will!
drinking_beer->Over the teeth, over the gums — look out, stomach, here it comes!
drinking_beer->When the liquor is inside, the pain goes elsewhere!
beer_good_opinion->Here's to your liver, [RECIPIENT_nameDef] — may it live as long as you last!
beer_good_opinion->Here's to stealing, cheating and lying, [RECIPIENT_nameDef] — may you cheat death, steal hearts and lie with your love!
beer_good_opinion->May the face of every good news and the back of every bad news be towards us!
beer_good_opinion->May the roof above us never fall in — and may we friends gathered below never fall out!
beer_good_opinion->May you be in heaven a half an hour before the devil knows you're dead, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]!
beer_good_opinion->May misfortune follow you the rest of your life — and never catch up, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]!
game_ur_invite->I'm going to play a game of Ur. Would you like to join me, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]?
game_ur_invite->Would you like to join me in a game of Ur, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]?
game_ur_neutral->I got [random_1_8] move points on the dice.
game_ur_neutral->I'll add a new racing piece.

game_hoopstone_invite->Would you like to join me in a hoopstone game, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]?
game_horseshoes_invite->I'm going to play horseshoes. Would you like to join me, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]?
game_horseshoes_invite->Would you like to join me in a horseshoes game, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]?
shooting_hit(INITIATOR_shooting_level<5)->Haha! Somehow bounced off the ground onto it...
shooting_excuse->a bug flew on my face!
going_to_bed->Let's call it a day, [RECIPIENT_nameDef] — I'm going to bed.
going_to_bed(INITIATOR_thoughtDefName==Sick,priority=1)->I'm not feeling well, [RECIPIENT_nameDef] — I'm going to bed.
going_to_bed(INITIATOR_thoughtDefName==NeedRest,priority=1)->I'm so tired... I'm going to bed...
poker_invite->I'm going to start a poker game. Would you like to join me, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]?
poker_invite->Would you like to join me in a poker game, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]?
poker_ready->Ok, new round of betting. I'll deal, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]. Ready?
poker_ready->My turn to deal. Ready for a new game, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]?
poker_ready->Are you in for another game, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]?
poker_ready->I cut and shuffled the deck. Are you ready, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]?
job_tv1->Hmmm... should I change the channel to a [tv_show]?
job_tv1->Do you want me to switch the television to [tv_letters], [RECIPIENT_nameDef]?
job_tv1->Seems like there's a new program airing... [tv_letters] [tv_news]. [RECIPIENT_nameDef], [wanna] [tv_seeit] together?
job_tv1->Hey, [RECIPIENT_nameDef] — there's this program called [tv_letters] [tv_news] airing right now. [wanna] [tv_seeit]?
job_tv2->Sorry... [tv_distraction] — what is it we're we watching now?
job_tv3->It's so quiet... [RECIPIENT_nameDef], do you know how to turn up the volume on this thing?
job_tv3->I can't hear what the characters are saying. How do you turn on the subtitles?
job_tv3->Jeez — the television is really [tv_volume]. How do you turn down the volume?
job_tv3->The tv audio seems to be cutting off. Do you know how to [fix] it, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]?
job_tv_whatsthis->What's this playing on the television, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]?
job_tv_whatsthis->This program looks so [adj_tv]... what is it about, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]?
job_stargazing->Hey — what's that bright flashing light I just saw?
job_stargazing(INITIATOR_intellectual_level>=5)->How interesting — that constellation there just looks like a [Animal]!
job_stargazing(DAYPERIOD==evening)->The stars looks so [stars_adj] this evening...
watching_sunrise->It's almost impossible to watch a sunrise and not dream...
watching_sunrise(INITIATOR_trait==kind)->The beauty of sunrise keeps my heart warm.
watching_sunrise(INITIATOR_artistic_passion!=None)->I always get excited when the sky turns pretty colors.
watching_sunrise(INITIATOR_artistic_passion!=None)->The blue sky paints itself with gold colors and joyfully dances to the music of a morning breeze...
watching_sunrise->A faint blush below the horizon, as the first kiss from the Sun wakes the Planet from its slumber.
watching_sunrise->When the sun rises, it rises for everyone.
watching_sunrise->What better way to start off the day than watching the sunrise?
watching_sunrise->How pretty... I'm speechless. Maybe the Rim isn't so bad, after all.
watching_sunrise->The sky is simply gorgeous today, and this sunrise only makes it prettier.
watching_sunrise(INITIATOR_trait==pyromaniac)->Good morning, my favorite fireball. Burn bright!
watching_sunset->I feel a wave of reassurance when I watch the sunset... as if everything will be okay tomorrow.
watching_sunset->Look at those beautiful colors in the sky...
watching_sunset->Twilight drops her curtain down and pins it with a star.
watching_sunset->Sunset is when I get my chance to reset.
watching_sunset(INITIATOR_artistic_passion!=None)->Sunset is the opening music of the night.
watching_sunset->What better way to finish off the day than watching the sunset?
watching_sunset->How pretty... I'm speechless. Maybe the Rim isn't so bad, after all.
watching_sunset(INITIATOR_trait==ascetic)->The blessed Sun is going down. Sleep tight, Mother Nature.
watching_sunset->The sky is simply gorgeous today, and this sunset only makes it prettier.
watching_sunset->I feel as if all my suffering washes away when I gaze at the setting sun...
using_telescope->Woah! I think I can see another planet!
using_telescope->I wonder how many moons this planet has...
using_telescope->Hey — what's that bright flashing light I just saw?
using_telescope(DAYPERIOD==evening)->The stars looks so [stars_adj] this evening...
job_viewart_1->I like this [artwork]; it looks very [adj_artwork].
job_viewart_1->I like this [NEAREST_art]; it looks very [adj_artwork].
job_viewart_1->Look at this [NEAREST_art], [RECIPIENT_nameDef]! Isn't it just so [adj_artwork]?
artistic_passion->This [NEAREST_art] fosters my natural connection to Art, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]. Isn't it just so [adj_artwork]?
artistic_passion->This [NEAREST_art] and its [adj_artwork] sprezzaturas visit my very soul...
artistic_passion->This [adj_artwork] [artwork] is a generous cornucopia for my eyes!
no_artistic_passion->[no_artistic_passion_start], but I find this [NEAREST_art] to be quite [adj_artwork]...
no_artistic_passion->[no_artistic_passion_start], but I find this [artwork] to be quite [adj_artwork]...
no_artistic_passion_start->I don't enjoy arts in general
no_artistic_passion_start->I never made efforts to understand and enjoy arts
no_artistic_passion_start->I never had the chance or will to develop my artistic sense
no_artistic_passion_start->I don't have an eye for art
no_artistic_passion_start->The arts really are not my thing
job_visitpawn(tag=GetWell)->Don't worry, [RECIPIENT_nameDef] — you'll get well very soon!
job_visitpawn(tag=GetWell)->I'm sure you'll be fine in no time, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]!
job_visitpawn(p=0.5,tag=HowAreYou)->So, how is our patient doing?
visitpawn_thanks->If you need anything, let me know — OK, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]?
visitpawn_thanks->If I can do anything to help, let me know — OK, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]?
visitpawn_takecare(INITIATOR_medical_level<5)->I'll do my best to take care of you.
visitpawn_takecare(INITIATOR_medical_level>=10)->with my high medical skills, you'll get well in no time.
job_recipient_butchering(RECIPIENT_cooking_level>=6)->Well, [RECIPIENT_nameDef] — luckily for us, looks like you know how to properly butcher!
job_recipient_butchering(RECIPIENT_cooking_level<6)->Mmm, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]... looks like you're wasting good meat there...
vomiting_gross_dislike->I hope you're going to clean up that mess,
vomiting_help_offer->Oh my, [RECIPIENT_nameDef] — do you need help?
comment_nice_snowman(INITIATOR_opinion>=0)->that's going to be a beautiful snowman!
comment_nice_snowman(INITIATOR_opinion<0)->are you actually building that... snowy mess on purpose!?
comment_ugly_snowman(INITIATOR_opinion>=0)->if it's not going to be a nice snowman, it'll be a funny one at least!
comment_ugly_snowman(INITIATOR_opinion<0)->what [horrible] [monster] are you trying to build there?
play_instrument_compliment->Please, [RECIPIENT_nameDef] — play some more! It was so good!
play_instrument_compliment->That was some real inspired performance, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]!
play_instrument_compliment->Ah, I love this part... and I love how you play it, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]...
play_instrument_compliment(INITIATOR_opinion<0,priority=1)->Mmm... at least you have some musical skills, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]...
play_instrument_compliment(RECIPIENT_artistic_passion==Minor)->I can feel all your passion in those sweet notes, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]!
play_instrument_compliment(RECIPIENT_artistic_passion==Major)->Such a nice performance! It makes me feel all the joy and strenght of your artistic soul, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]!
play_instrument_compliment(INITIATOR_artistic_level>=5)->I know a good performer when I see one — and you're certainly that, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]!
play_instrument_compliment(INITIATOR_artistic_level>RECIPIENT_artistic_level)->Mmm... I have some hints for you about performing this music, but still — good job, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]!
play_instrument_compliment(INITIATOR_artistic_level<RECIPIENT_artistic_level)->You're so talented, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]! I hope someday you can teach me a thing or two about performing this music!
play_instrument_critic->Have you considered playing another instrument, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]? This one doesn't seem to agree with you...
play_instrument_critic->Have you considered playing another music, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]? This one seems to be too difficult for you...
play_instrument_critic->Well, [RECIPIENT_nameDef] — no offense, but I don't believe this is your best performance...
play_instrument_critic(RECIPIENT_artistic_level>=5)->Mmm, [RECIPIENT_nameDef] — I know you can perform better than that...
play_instrument_critic(RECIPIENT_artistic_passion!=None)->I felt some passion in your performance, but... mmm... maybe you need more practicing to get it right, [RECIPIENT_nameDef].
play_instrument_critic(INITIATOR_artistic_level>=5,RECIPIENT_artistic_passion!=None)->The talent is there, [RECIPIENT_nameDef] — I can see it clearly. But you need much training still...

play_instrument_critic(INITIATOR_artistic_level>RECIPIENT_artistic_level)->May I give you some hints about performing this music? No offense, [RECIPIENT_nameDef] — but I didn't enjoy your performance.
play_instrument_critic(INITIATOR_artistic_level<RECIPIENT_artistic_level)->Was that your personal way of playing it, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]? I couldn't understand what you were trying to do there...
play_instrument_hostile_critic(INITIATOR_artistic_level<5)->I'm no artist myself, but I can easily understand this is quite a bad performance!
play_instrument_hostile_critic(RECIPIENT_artistic_passion!=None)->Your raw skills sound horrible, [RECIPIENT_nameDef] — and no amount of training can change that!

play_instrument_hostile_critic(INITIATOR_artistic_level>RECIPIENT_artistic_level)->And you call that a performance? Don't be around when I perform — I don't want to humiliate you, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]!
play_instrument_kindcomment->Thanks for your — err — nice performance, [RECIPIENT_nameDef].
play_instrument_kindcomment->Don't worry about that mistake [RECIPIENT_nameDef] — it's just a very minor one.
play_instrument_kindcomment(INITIATOR_artistic_level>=5)->A minor mistake, [RECIPIENT_nameDef] — easily corrected. Don't worry, play on!
trait_ascetic->Remember — one day you shall die. Shine today, at your best, while you can.
trait_ascetic->Look in the mirror — for that's where you can find the only person worth competing with.
trait_ascetic->Being truly rich is not about having great possessions — it's about having few wants.
trait_ascetic->He who fears death will never do anything worth of a man who is alive.
trait_ascetic->You can control your mind — not outside events. Absorb this, and you shall find strength.
trait_ascetic->One true mistake we can make in our lives — not strive to improve ourselves.
trait_ascetic(INITIATOR_animals_passion!=None)->Observe the [Animal] and its simpler life — there is a lot to learn from it.
lucky_day->is going to be my lucky day!
trait_psy_sensitive(tag=PsyVisionGood)->[vision_start] about a [AdjectiveFriendly] [PersonJob] admiring a [nice] [TerrainFeature] from afar.
trait_psy_sensitive(tag=PsyVisionGood)->[vision_start] about a [AdjectiveLarge] [Animal] saving a [AdjectiveAngsty] [Community] from a [AdjectiveBadass] [Enemy].
trait_psy_sensitive(tag=PsyVision)->[vision_start] about a [AdjectiveLarge] [AnimalGroup] of [Animal]s in a [TreeType] forest.
trait_psy_sensitive(tag=PsyVision)->[vision_start] about a [Color] [Animal] and a [Color] [Animal] competing for the same [TerrainFeature].
trait_psy_sensitive(tag=PsyVision)->[vision_start] about a [AdjectiveAny] [Apparel] dancing in the wind over a [TerrainFeature].
trait_psy_sensitive(tag=PsyVision)->[vision_start] about a group of [PersonJob]s visiting a [Community] to buy [AdjectiveAny] [Apparel]s.
trait_psy_sensitive(tag=PsyVision)->[vision_start] about a [PersonJob] arguing with a [PersonJob] about a [AdjectiveAny] [Weapon].
trait_psy_sensitive(tag=PsyVision)->[vision_start] about a group of [PersonJob]s visiting a [Community] to buy [AdjectiveAny] [Weapon]s.
trait_psy_sensitive(tag=PsyVisionBad)->[vision_start] about a [AdjectiveBadass] [Enemy] with a [AdjectiveBadass] [Weapon] covered in [Gore].
trait_psy_sensitive(tag=PsyVisionBad)->[vision_start] about [Quantity_adjphrase] [AdjectiveBadass] [Enemy]s — and one of them wielded a [AdjectiveLarge] [AdjectiveBadass] [Weapon].
trait_psy_sensitive(tag=PsyVisionBad)->[vision_start] about a [AdjectiveBadass] [Mechanoid] chasing a group of [PersonJob]s into a [TerrainFeature].
trait_psy_sensitive(tag=PsyVisionBad)->[vision_start] about two coffins — one had a dead [PersonJob] in it, the other was empty.
what_about_yours->What do you think of yours, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]?
sent(RECIPIENT_faction!=PlayerColony,tag=PrisonerRefuses)->I hope you're ready to join us?
